body_html:
One reason we had added MKL download in the config file was to enable the user to be able to point to a local copy instead of downloading it. Is it possible to accomplish the same if the download is through bazel?

Other than this the changes look fine.

Other than this the changes look fine.
body:
One reason we had added MKL download in the config file was to enable the user to be able to point to  a local copy instead of downloading it. Is it possible to accomplish the same if the download is  through bazel? 

Other than this the changes look fine.
